content.question: Which of the following would best support the assertion that hierarchies based on racial classification emerged after 1500 C.E. to maintain the authority of new elite groups in the Americas?

choices.label: The use of terms such as mestizo, mulatto and creole
The increasingly common use of European names in the Americas
New maritime technology facilitating long-term voyages by Europeans
The introduction of slavery to the Americas after the voyages of Columbus

content.answer: The use of terms such as mestizo, mulatto and creole
